GSD.description:
media: atomisp: fix dummy_ptr check to avoid duplicate active_bo

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.16.19 by commit edaa87390aab4d9452730540243c2f0ef06d5fc9. For more details please see the references link.
